remarks: Value of the greatest lower function of a poset.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 6-Sep-2018.)
statement:
glbfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbfval.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
glbfval.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbfval.p $e |- ( ps <-> ( A. y e. s x .<_ y /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. s z .<_ y -> z .<_ x ) ) ) $.
glbfval.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
glbfval $p |- ( ph -> G = ( ( s e. ~P B |-> ( iota_ x e. B ps ) ) |` { s | E! x e. B ps } ) ) $.
$d B s x z $.
$d K s x y z $.
